title: Manufacturing Process Improvement Project Engineer NEW!
full_description: This full time, permanent Manufacturing Process Improvement Project Engineer career opportunity is at a growing company that is expanding its current casting operations. This is an incredible opportunity to be involved in that expansion. All manufacturing operations are in the United States. Employees enjoy working here and the average employee tenure is 15 to 20 years.The duties and responsibilities of the successful candidate should include the following:Managing projects from concept through productionSchedulingBeing responsible for fixturing, tooling, gauging and production routingImproving manufacturing processesInteracting with a variety of coworkers, management and customersMeeting safety and quality requirementsWorking the quality employees to correct issuesMinimizing manufacturing costs and scrapThe background of the successful candidate will include the following:A four year Mechanical Engineering, Manufacturing Engineering, Materials Engineering, Metallurgical Engineering or related related degreeThree or more years of project engineering experience in a manufacturing environmentOne or more years of Solid Modeling experienceA solid work history
